attributes.action: Cease assets of all politically connected Russian nationals in the UK
attributes.additional_details: In order  to stop violence in Ukraine Cease assets of all politically connected Russian nationals in the UK to increase pressure on Russian leadership internally
attributes.background: Cease assets of all politically connected Russian nationals in the UK to increase pressure on Russian leadership internally

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609418
